application.summary: create a composition of photos and images

description.p: Fotowall is an application that allows you to easily create a composition of your photos. Simply import the photos you want, add captions, rotate the images, add shadows and blurs, and move the images around to make your own custom, creative composition. Fotowall is great for turning a bunch of your photos into a personalized, creative wallpaper -- it even can create a canvas the exact size of your desktop background.
